title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1478/1999 of 6 July 1999 fixing the final amount of aid for dried fodder for the 1998/99 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1478/1999
of 6 July 1999
fixing the final amount of aid for dried fodder for the 1998/99 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 July 1999.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
